titleInfo.title: Spring Bluegrass Festival at Orange Blossom Park (18656)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing a Spring Bluegrass Festival featuring Don Reno and Bill Harrell with the Tennessee Cut-Ups, and Mac Wiseman with the Shenandoah Cut-Ups at Orange Blossom Park on June 10, 11, and 12. Poster features metal photoplates of Don Reno, Bill Harrell, and Mac Wiseman. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/45912/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
